item.description:
How many times have you longed for a specific desire only to be disappointed by the results?

For instance, your listening to the radio and it just tells you “Today’s winning jackpot is at $25,000,000”. You say to yourself, “There is my sign. I want this money. I need it to pay my bills. I know how the Law of Attraction works. What I think about I can bring about. I am going to win the lottery.” You buy a ticket and begin to tell others that you bought the winning ticket. You may evening begin convincing yourself that this could be a winning ticket. Yet, once again the numbers are draw and you do not have the winning ticket.

Soon doubts about the Law of Attraction begin to creep in, thoughts such as, “This Law of Attraction stuff just does not work. I did not create a life of struggle and lack of money. Didn’t I just try to manifest financial abundance?”

NOW, how many of you have experienced this before and know why this example backfired?

One reason is financial abundance is simply a physical manifestation of our thoughts partnered with our feelings. The keyword here is feelings. This is the precise reason that many people often fail when setting out to manipulate the Law of Attraction to bring financial abundance into their lives.

The Law of Attraction is always at work whether you realize it or not, and whether you believe it or not. The problem for a lot of people lies in their understanding and the application of this Law.

http://www.lawofattractioninteraction.com/lottery.php

Join us as we discuss:

· How attracting abundance and money are different

· The power behind vibrationally spending vibrational money

· Why needing money won’t attract money

· How giving away money brings more money to you

· Become a joyful creator in finding the passion in what you do

Discussion will come from Esther & Jerry Hicks’ book Money, and the Law of Attraction

 

Please call if you are joining us for the first time

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

Topics this Month:

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Seeking Financial Abundance
